Name: Firewerx
About the game: Ready to Become A Pyrotechnics Expert? Firewerx is a firework building simulation game with an ever growing list of customisation options and possibilities. Choose your colours, shapes, effects and more to create the greatest firework show! Sandbox Mode! In Early Access, with the raw ingredients at your disposal craft a variety of custom fireworks with their own unique shapes, colours, patterns and more! Each firework can hold several firework stars, each configurable with their own visual elements and settings. Fulfil Orders! On release, participate in Story Mode and run the Firewerx Co business! Take in orders from wealthy customers, create the desired fireworks and set up a show! Do it properly, and you may be rewarded handsomely. Key Features Craft Firework Stars, Fuses and Firework Tubes to create the firework of your dreams A progression-based story mode, with economy and endless tasks An unrestrictive Sandbox mode with additional options to disable existing limits on items
